verses.content: “I unaupa Aron hi Israel thlahai laia inthawkin ama le a naupasalhai hi, thiempu sina ka hmaha rawng an bâwl theina dingin Aron le Aron naupasalhai, Nadab le Abihu, Eleazar le Ithamar hi i kuomah la tum rawh.
I unaupa Aron ta dingin mawina ding le ropuina dingin silfên inthieng i siempêk ding a nih.
Mi, lungrila varna nei, varna thlaraua ka suksiphai po chu, Aron silfênhai siem dingin hril rawh, ama chu thiempu sina ka kuoma rawng a bâwl theina dinga inhlânthieng a ni theina dingin.

“Hieng hi silfên an siem dinghai chu a nih: âwmbel, zakawsîng, zakaw fuol le zakawchung ṭhuimawi, lu- kâwm le kâwngkhi hi; chun, i unaupa Aron le a naupasalhai chu thiempu sina ka kuoma rawng an bâwl theina dingin silfên inthienghai siempêk an tih.
Chun, rângkachak zai le sahmul dumpâwl, a êm le seninlâr le pat zai inhmi kawp hmang an tih.
“Chun, rângkachak zai le sahmul dumpâwl le, a êm le seninlârin kut- thiemtakin zakawsîng chu siem an tih.
An khai detna dingin a dârbel pahni, a hmawr hniha ṭhui mat a ni ding a nih.

Chun, zakawsîng chunga a khitna ṭhuimawi chu siem dân thu- hmun bawka siem, zawm khat a ni ding a na; rângkachak zai le sahmul dumpâwl, a êm le seninlâr le pat zai inhmi kawp ṭhataka siem bawk a ni ding a nih.
Chun, onik lung pahni lâng i ta, chuhaia chun Israel thlahai hming chu ker i tih;
an piengzie indawt ang peiin hming paruk chu lung pakhatah, hming paruk dang chu lung danga chun ker i tih.
Lungkertuin hming namna a ker angin, lung pahnia chun Israel thlahai hming indawt ang peiin ker i ta, rângkachak kerkuokhaia thun dingin siem i tih.

Israel thlahai ta dinga hriet zingna lunghai dingin, chu lung pahni chu thiempu zakawsîng dâr belhaia chun sieng i ta; chuongchun, Aron chun hriet zingna dingin a liengko pahni chunga chun an hminghai chu LALPA hmaa chun put zing a tih.
“Rângkachak kerkuokhai siem i ta, rângkachak inthieng khaidiet pahni hruol anga inherthlawp leh;
chun, khaidiet herthlawphai chu kerkuokhaia chun thun i tih.
“Kutthiem takin rorêlna âwm- bel siem i ta, zakawsîng siem dân ang bawk khan siem i tih: rângkachak zai, sahmul dumpâwl, a êm, senin- lâr le pat zai inhmi-kawpin siem i tih.
Kil li nei a thuo a ni ding a na, a sei tieng khâp khat, a lien tieng khâp khat bawk a ni ding a nih.
A sûnga chun lung phûm chihai tlar liin phûm i ta, a tlar hmasa tak chu sardion, topaz le karbankle lung,
a tlar hnina chu emeral, sapphir le endonuk (lunghlu),
a tlar thumna chu jasinth, agate le amethust,
a palina chu birul, onik le jasper lung nîng a ta, a phûmna chu râng- kachaka tuom khum seng ni bawk an tih.
Lunghai chu sawmpahni, Israel naupasalhai hming indawt ang peiin nîng an ta, hmingnamna kerhai angin Israel hnam sâwmpahni hming chu ker ning a tih.
Âwmbel chunga chun rângka- chak inthieng khaidiet, hruol anga inherthlawp siem i tih;
chun, âwmbel chunga chun rângkachak kuol pahni siem i ta; chu kuolhai pahni chu âwmbel hmawr pahnia chun inbûk i tih.
Rângkachak khaidiet pahni chu âwmbel hmawra kuol pahnia chun inbûk i tih.
Khaidiet pahni hmawrhai chu kerkuok pahnia chun thun i ta, zakawsîng dârbelhai hmatieng panga chun khai i tih.
Rângkachak kuol pahni siem i ta, zakawsîng deptieng pang sûng, a tlâng sîr chunga âwmbel pahni hmawrhaia chun inbûk i tih.

Rângkachak kuol pahni bawk siem i ta, zakawsîng hmatieng panga dârbel pahni hnuoitieng pang, a thuo sûnghnung lem hnuoitienga ân tuokna, zakawsîng hrui thiemtaka khâwng inbûkna chung taka khan inbûk i tih.
Chun, âwmbel chu zakawsînga kawp thlapna dingin le, zakawsîng hrui thiemtaka khâwng chunga chun a um theina dingin âwmbela a kuolhai le zakawsînga a kuolhaia chun hrui dumpâwlin khit mat an tih.
Chun, Aron chun LALPA hmah- a hriet zingna dingin Hmun In- thienga a fe po leh, a lungkhur chunga rorêlna âwmbela chun Israel thlahai hming chu phur zing a tih.

Rorêlna âwmbela chun Urim le Thummim inbûk i ta, LALPA hmaha a fe laiin Aron lung chung taka chun an um ding a nih; chuongchun, Aron chun Israel thlahai rorêlpêkna chu LALPA hmaah a lung chunga chun a phur zing zing ding a nih.
“Chu zakawfuol chu a dumpâwl vawngin i siem ding a nih.
A hmawr a lai zâwnah a lu âwng a um ding a na, a lu âwng chu a vêl tuok chun ân ek nawna dingin, indona phâw zakuo angin puon a khâwnga khâwnga tuom ding a nih.
A hmawr tlânghaia chun thei- bufai dumpâwl, a êm le seninlârin, a hmawr tlâng vêl po poa chun i siem ding a nih; an inkârah rângkachak telnênghai leh,
zakawfuol hmawr tlâng vêl tuoka chun rângkachak telnêng, theibufai, rângkachak telnêng le theibufai ti anga inkârthlâkin a um ding a nih.
Aronin rawng a bâwl pha chun chuong ang chun inthuom a ta, a ri chu LALPA hmaa Hmun Inthienga a fe lai le a hung suok lai chun hriet a ni ding a nih, a thi nawna dingin.
“Chun, rângkachak inthieng phêk siem i ta, a chunga chun hmingnamna kerhai angin, ‘LALPA TA DINGA INTHIENG,’ ti ker i tih.
Chu chu hrui dumpâwlin lu- kâwm chungtienga chun khitdêng i ta, lukhim hmatieng panga chun a um ding a nih.

Aron bâwk chunga chun a um ding a na. Aron chun Israel thlahaiin thilpêk inthienga an ipêk thil inthienghaia suolna um phawt chu phur a tih: LALPA hmaa pawm a ni theina dingin a bâwka chun a um zing ding a nih.
“Chun, zakawchung puonzaiin- hmi kil li neia ṭiel khâwng i ta, puonzaiinhmi bawk lukhimin siem i ta; chun, kâwngkhi puon ṭhuimawi- takin siem bawk i tih.
“Aron naupasalhai ta dinga mawina le ropuina dingin zakaw- chunghai, kâwngkhihai le lukhimhai siempêk i tih.
I unaupa Aron le a naupasalhai chu inhâktir i ta, anni chu ka hmaa thiempu sina rawng an bâwl theina dingin hriek nâl i ta, namdet i ta, inhlân thieng i tih.
Chun, an taksa saruokna inkhum dingin kekawr hnuoi siem- pêk i ta, kâwnga inthawka êlpui chen tlung an tih;

chuong chu Aron le a naupa- salhai chun an bun ding a nih, intuokna puon ina an hung lût phain amanih, Hmun Inthienga rawng bâwl dinga mâichâm an hung hnai phain amanih, suolna phura an thi nawna dingin. Ama le ama hnunga a thlahai chena khawm hi hi dân nîng a tih.
